long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hyper Snake is a Chrome Extension version of an addictive skill-based game where you control a snake that grows longer as you collect balls. The objective is to navigate your snake through the level, finding the optimal path to collect as many balls as possible without running into obstacles or the edges of the screen. The game becomes increasingly challenging as your snake grows longer, requiring precision and quick reflexes to maneuver through the level. How far can you make it in Hyper Snake before your snake meets its demise? Players can also enjoy this free-to-play version of the game on the website https://classroom-6x.org/.

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://classroom-6x.org, https://poki.ee
